participant_1.background:
My hair is black.
I like rock climbing.
I am a writer.
I am gluten free.

participant_2.background:
I am currently on a diet.
I would like to go to school to become a veterinarian.
I love animals and i want to help them.
I love going to the gym.

content.text: Hello! What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I love going to the gym and eating healthy. I want to go to school to become a veterinarian. What about you?
I love rock climbing and writing. I am a writer and my hair is black. I am currently gluten free.
That's cool! I have never tried rock climbing. What kind of things do you like to write?
I like to write science fiction and fantasy novels. I am working on a novel about a group of friends who go on an adventure to the moon.
That sounds really cool! I love science fiction and fantasy. What is your favorite science fiction or fantasy novel?

My favorite science fiction novel is Dune by Frank Herbert. It's about a planet called Arrakis, which is the only place where spice can be found. Spice is a valuable substance that gives people increased powers of perception and longevity.
That sounds really interesting! I have never heard of it before. I will have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
So, what are your goals for the future?
I want to go to school to become a veterinarian. I love animals and I want to help them.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you will be a great veterinarian.
So, what are you doing now?
I am currently on a diet. I want to get healthy and fit so that I can be a good veterinarian.
That's great! I am sure you will be healthy and fit in no time.
